mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (user_account_id, nick_name, admin_yn) VALUES (#{userAccountId}, #{nickName}, #{admin_yn})
INSERT INTO profiles (user_id, password, user_email) VALUES (#{userId}, #{password}, #{userEmail})
INSERT INTO survey (user_id, gender, age, goal, level, abnormal) VALUES (#{userId}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{goal}, #{level}, #{abnormal})
INSERT INTO point_add (user_id, points_added, reason) VALUES (#{userId}, #{pointsAdded}, #{reason})

INSERT INTO point_aggr (user_id, total_points, current_points) VALUES ( #{userId},
(SELECT COALESCE(SUM(points_added), 0) FROM point_add WHERE user_id = #{userId}),
(SELECT COALESCE(SUM(points_added), 0) FROM point_add WHERE user_id = #{userId}) ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE
total_points = total_points + (SELECT points_added FROM point_add WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY added_at DESC LIMIT 1), current_points = current_points + (SELECT points_added FROM point_add WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY added_at DESC LIMIT 1);
INSERT INTO point_subtract (user_id, points_subtracted, reason) VALUES (#{userId}, #{pointsSubtracted}, #{reason})
mapper.select: SELECT u.*, p.* FROM users u JOIN profiles p ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE u.user_account_id = #{userAccountId}
